title: Katherine Short dies at 42
desc: Katherine Short, daughter of Canadian comedian and actor Martin Short, has died, a family representative confirmed to CTV News. She was 42.

title: Disabled woman put in nursing home against her will says she feels 'betrayed'
desc: Lucinda Ritchie previously lived in her own adapted bungalow in Billingshurst, West Sussex.

title: Delhi to be renamed Indraprastha? BJP MP writes to Amit Shah after Kerala's name change
desc: India News: NEW DELHI: BJP MP Praveen Khandelwal on Wednesday wrote to Union home minister Amit Shah requesting that the national capital, Delhi, be renamed Indra.

title: Ministry dismisses Al
desc: DODOMA: THE Ministry of Lands, Housing and Human Settlements Development has dismissed claims by Al-Malid Institution regarding ownership of Plot No. 8, Block A, Nzuguni area in Dodoma, saying official records do not support the allegations. title: PM Ousmane Sonko seeks tougher legislation, doubling prison terms
desc: The bill seeks prison terms of five to ten years for what it describes as "acts against nature".

title: Cricket: White Ferns cruise to victory over Zimbabwe in first T20
desc: The White Ferns have defeated Zimbabwe in their Twenty20 International series-opener in Hamilton.

title: OUT focuses on research innovation NDV2050

title: Man who assaulted senior citizen after minor collision jailed 4 months
desc: Judge holds that the accused’s conduct was unjustified and had serious consequences.

title: Mount Rinjani Hiking Trails Set to Reopen March 28, 2026
desc: Hiking to Mount Rinjani was previously closed since January 1, 2026, due to extreme weather conditions.
